column2: "Yaaaaaaaaaaaaaa! Hey you ARKS there! Yes, I mean you!"
"Did I reflect on our conversation before? What conversation? Anyways, meeting you here must be fate!"
"The fact that you became an ARKS must be fate! Darkers appearing must be fate! Reports of people disappearing must also be fate!"
"We have some really bad fate! It's said that a lot of coincidences indicates a plan. But there's no way that's true!"
"Hm, I think I smell some photons in trouble. I'm off, may we meet again!"
